items.sentence: Does anyone here know how to get this window open?
Does anyone here know how to operate this machine?
I asked Tom if he was cold, but he shook his head.
I had not expected Tom to be able to speak French.
The office\'s air conditioning doesn\'t work well.
What\'s the most trouble you\'ve ever gotten into?
I don\'t think anybody suspected you weren\'t Tom.
I don\'t think it\'s going to be easy to find Tom.
I don\'t think it\'s going to be hard to find Tom.
Tom cancelled his party because something came up.
Tom certainly came up with some interesting ideas.
Tom certainly has a lot of friends in high places.
Some people don\'t realize how fortunate they are.
I hope Tom didn\'t tell anybody about what we did.
I hope that you won\'t tell Tom about what we did.
I just couldn\'t do everything Tom asked me to do.
My weight hasn\'t changed in the last three years.
I\'d prefer to study French from a native speaker.
It\'s very likely somebody will be waiting for us.
Tom went out of his way to make Mary feel at home.
I see a big smile on your face. You must be happy.
It was nice of you to come all this way to see me.
I don\'t see any way of stopping Tom from dancing.
I don\'t sit next to Tom in science class anymore.

It\'s the worst thing that\'s ever happened to me.

Mary must\'ve been very pretty when she was young.

I can\'t tell you how good it is to see you again.
No matter how fast you run, you won\'t be in time.

I\'ve never seen Tom do anything like that before.
Mary was the most beautiful woman at Tom\'s party.

Do you have enough people here to play volleyball?

What\'s the price per night including all charges?

Aren\'t you going to tell Tom about what happened?
